name: FollowMe
0:
”Alexa tell follow me set a timer for 10 minutes to take out the dog”
”Alexa tell follow me transfer my timers here”
”Alexa tell follow me set a timer for 10 minutes for check the oven”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: follow me
des: If you've ever created an oven timer in the kitchen and then moved to your home office and missed the timer then this skill is for you. "Alexa ask follow me for a ten minute time for checking the oven". Then from your new location say "Alexa tell follow me to transfer my timers here".
